trans-unit.source: A trigger action that provides functionality for seeking (skipping) to a specified time within the active period of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma ação de acionamento que fornece funcionalidade de pesquisa (ignorar) para um tempo especificado com o período ativo de um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use a SeekStoryboard action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to seek a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar uma ação de SeekStoryboard com um <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>ou um <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>Procurar o ressarcimento <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: Note that seek operations do not take the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> settings into account: the storyboard is treated as though it had a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> of 1 and no <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que as operações de pesquisa não entram o storyboard <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>definições em consideração: o storyboard é tratado como se se tratasse tinha um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>de 1 e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: Seeking a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> triggers its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> events.

Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Colocar em pausa, retomar, parar, caso contrário, o controlo um guião gráfico principal interativamente para conseguir fazer pausa, retomar ou caso contrário, controlar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>interativamente, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>propriedade do respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>e utilizar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>objeto (como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) para controlar a consultar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>não foi especificado, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>não pode ser controlado interativamente depois é iniciada.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [como: utilizar os accionadores de eventos para controlar um guião gráfico principal depois desta ser iniciada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount by which the storyboard should move forward or backward from the seek origin <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a quantidade através do qual o storyboard deve mover o reencaminhar ou trás da origem de procura <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>

trans-unit.source: A positive or negative value that specifies the amount by which the storyboard should move forward or backward from the seek origin <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor positivo ou negativo que especifica a quantidade através do qual o storyboard deve mover o reencaminhar ou trás da origem de procura <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position from which this seek operation's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*> is applied.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a posição a partir do qual esta operação de pesquisa do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>é aplicada.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>

trans-unit.source: The position from which this seek operation's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*> is applied.
trans-unit.target: A posição a partir do qual esta operação de pesquisa do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>é aplicada.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*> property of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"></xref> should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>propriedade deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"> </xref> devem ser serializadas.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>

trans-unit.source: **true** if the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*> property of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"></xref> should be serialized; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **Verdadeiro** se o <> </> *> propriedade deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"> </xref> deve ser serializada; caso contrário, * *falso**.
